'''User Images''' File:Linksys WPC54GS v1 top.jpg| File:Linksys WPC54GS v1 bot.jpg| File:Linksys WPC54GS bagbipes.net 001.jpg|inards

        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: b43-pci-bridge
